subject: RE: RE: Videos - Replacing Springs and Rubber
description_text:
Thanks, Ariel!

Please also send the Pro Plus Manual.
Regarding the haptic motors, are you sending 2 or 3 motors for each model? Did you include the power supply and brackets?

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director

The pictures are attached, please check.  The invoice has been attached. It contains your address information. Please complete it yourself.

________________________________

Hi Paulo Franca,

As we are currently relocating our factory, I’ll check with my colleagues tomorrow to see if they can provide the necessary information, and I’ll send it to you via WeChat.

On Wed, 2 Jul at 2:49 PM , Paulo Franca <paulo@wyfort.com<mailto:paulo@wyfort.com>> wrote:
Sorry, but I don’t agree.
I must provide the Manual in Portuguese.
How Am I supposed to do it?
You can send the file for translation and send me the Manual in Portuguese, if you are worried about data protection.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director

conversations.body_text: Hi Paulo Franca,  Please communicate via WeChat.

Ariel,

Please find attached the shipping docs.
The Zip code provide didn’t work 410221, I used 410021, let me know if that is ok.
Please review your information in the documents and schedule the pickup with DHL.
I wait for your confirmation.

Best Regards,
Paulo Franca
Wyfort Electronics, Sales Director
[cid:image001.jpg@01DC0613.61C83BD0]

http://www.wyfort.com<http://www.wyfort.com/>
